meta.name: Am I The A**hole?
meta.description: In this unfiltered new panel show, Jimmy Carr is joined by internet sensation GK Barry and acclaimed stand-up Jamali Maddix to judge an array of questionable characters and their equally questionable choices.

videos.title: A Flatmate Who Uses Radioactive Material to Get Her Own Way
videos.overview: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and Jimmy pass judgement on a flatmate who uses radioactive material to get her own way, and a woman obsessed with STI checks.

videos.title: Bill Splitting Angst and a Gassy Girlfriend
videos.overview: Comedy panel show in which Jimmy Carr is joined by GK Barry and Jamali Maddix to preside over a parade of people making jaw-dropping confessions, and judge how bad they really are.

videos.title: A Sassy Psychic and a Saucy Phobia
videos.overview: GK Barry and Jamali Maddix pass judgement on a controversial psychic, someone who ended a friendship over ketchup, and some wild revenge against an ex.

videos.title: Baby Fiction and Snoring Friction
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix pass judgement on a man who faked having a baby, an unrepentant snorer and a brutal date dodger.

videos.title: A Man Who Dumped His Mum While on Holiday
videos.overview: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and the host pass judgement on a man who dumped his mum while on holiday and someone with a rather dubious ick.

videos.title: A Woman Who Lied About Her Age to a Partner
videos.overview: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and Jimmmy pass judgement on people including a woman who lied about her age to a partner and a mother who took extreme measures over her daughter's mess.

videos.title: A Man Who Helps Himself to His Co-Workers' Lunches
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix pass judgement on a man who helps himself to his co-workers' lunches and gives their opinions on adoption disputes.

videos.title: A Man Who Steals From Shopping Trollies
videos.overview: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and the host pass judgement on a man who steals from shopping trollies while a mother and daughter settle an awkward dispute.

videos.title: A Flatmate Who Uses Radioactive Material to Get Her Own Way
videos.overview: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and Jimmy pass judgement on a flatmate who uses radioactive material to get her own way, and a woman obsessed with STI checks.
